00015 class RadioButtonItem : public Linkable<RadioButtonItem> {
00016     public:
00017         RadioButtonItem(const WCHAR *text = 0, BOOLEAN pressed = FALSE) :
00018             m_text(text), m_pressed(pressed) {}
00019 
00020         // Sets the text of the item.
00021         void SetText(const WCHAR *text) { m_text = text; };
00022 
00023         // Returns the text of the item.
00024         const WCHAR* GetText() const { return m_text; };
00025 
00026         // Sets the selection of the item.
00027         void SetPressed(BOOLEAN pressed) { m_pressed = pressed; };
00028 
00029         // Returns <b>TRUE</b>, if the checkbox is pressed.
00030         BOOLEAN IsPressed() const { return m_pressed; };
00031 
00033         void SetValue(INT value) { m_value = value; }
00034 
00036         INT GetValue() { return m_value; }
00037 
00038     private:
00039         const WCHAR *m_text;
00040         BOOLEAN     m_pressed;
00041         INT         m_value;
00042 };

00047 template<class Content> class TRadioButtonItem : public RadioButtonItem {
00048     public:
00049         typedef RadioButtonItem Base;
00050 
00053         TRadioButtonItem() : Base(0, FALSE) {}
00054         TRadioButtonItem(const WCHAR *text) : Base(text, FALSE) {}
00055         TRadioButtonItem(const WCHAR *text, BOOLEAN pressed) : Base(text, pressed) {}
00056

00059
